articles.author: Elaine Chen
articles.title: ADA says all diabetes patients should be screened for nonalcoholic fatty liver disease - STAT
articles.description: The American Diabetes Association said Sunday that all adults with type 2 diabetes or prediabetes should be screened for nonalcoholic fatty liver disease.
articles.content: SAN DIEGO  The American Diabetes Association said Sunday that all adults with type 2 diabetes or prediabetes should be screened for nonalcoholic fatty liver disease, an increasingly prevalent conditi… [+3557 chars]

articles.author: Meghan Rabbitt
articles.title: If It Seems Like Allergies Are Getting Worse for All of Us, It's Because They Are. This is the New Thinking on Why—and What to Do About It - Maria Shriver's Sunday Paper
articles.description: If it seems like our allergies are getting worse—hay fever, eczema, asthma, peanut allergies—it’s because they are. An estimated 30 to 40 percent of the world’s population have some form of allergy, according to the American Academy of Allergy, Asthma, and Im…
